bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism identical with xue ji 血積①, blood accumulation. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 3: 治子 門閉，血聚腹中生肉癥 , “To cure closure of the uterus opening, with blood collection and meat concretion-illness in the abdomen”.

② Pathological Condition identical with xue jie 血結② , blood nodes. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry gan di huang 乾 地黃 quotes Mei shi fang 梅師方 : 若血聚，以針決之 , “In the case of blood collection , open it with a needle”.
